casebody.data:
McGILL MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Evsor LEVITON and Isidore Leviton, Partners, Doing Business under the Name of Leviton Manufacturing Company (not Inc.), Evsor Leviton, and Isidore Leviton, Defendants-Appellees. No. 54. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 17, 1930. See, also, 43 F.(2d) 607. George L. Wheelock, of New York City (Max W. Zabel, of Chicago, Ill., of counsel), for appellant. Gifford, Scull & Burgess, of New York City (George F. Scull and Charles W. Mortimer, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [36 F.(2d) 228] affirmed.
